job.title: Machine Learning Engineer
job.description: <p>Machine Learning Engineer</p><p>6 months contract </p><p>100% Remote</p><p><br></p><p><strong>Qualifications:</strong></p><ul><li>Over 6 years of experience in Data and Analytics domain in a matrix environment, utilizing various SDLC methodologies</li><li>Experience with Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning (AI/ML)</li><li>Exposure working within a Cloud environment and experience with any Cloud (AWS preferred).</li><li>Experience in DevOps workflow and tools such as Git, Kubernetes, Docker, CloudFormation and others; Especially Docker and Kubernetes </li><li>Ability to collaborate with leaders, users, Data scientist, Data Engineers, vendors, and other IT teams</li><li>Ability to work with multiple projects and workstreams at one time. Must be able to deliver results based upon project deadlines.</li><li>Willing to flex daily work schedule to allow for time-zone differences for global team communications</li><li>Strong interpersonal and communication skills</li></ul><p></p>
